title: Who was David Foster Wallace? - Quora

response.answer_text: David Foster Wallace (author) was an America author best known for his bind buster 'Infinite Jest'. He committed suicide at the age of 46 succumbing to a battle with mental illness.  Read about his life and works on the links below: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Foster_Wallacehttp://www.newyorker.com/reporting/2009/03/09/090309fa_fact_max?currentPage=1http://www.theawl.com/2011/04/inside-david-foster-wallaces-private-self-help-library Every September readers around the world take up the Infinite summer challengeRead more about the challenge here. http://supreeth.in/blog/30-day-challenge-2-september/ http://infinitesummer.org/archives/215
David Foster Wallace was "a fucking human being."
